title: The Heart and circulatory system
creator_credit: Charles L. Finance, Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Media-Four Productions
brief_description: Establishes the function of the circulatory system in transporting oxygen and the history of ideas about this. Harvey’s early experiments are shown and also microphotography of the heart. Developments in current heart research are shown.
creator_credit_for_label: Charles L. Finance, Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Media-Four Productions
